item.description:
TC: Dallas Kennedy ( dallas@terpalum.umd.edu) and Anne (are.catwoman@verizon.net)

EVENT: Ever heard of the Semitic Museum and wondered what was inside? Now’s your chance to find out! The museum will extend their normal hours on Sunday afternoon to accommodate our private tour. Led by a museum docent, we’ll focus on the permanent Houses of Ancient Israel exhibit. Then it's out afterwards to eat at Harvard Square.
RSVP: Strongly recommended by Monday, Oct 20
MEET: 3:45 p.m. at the Harvard Square T stop, or meet us at the Museum at 4 p.m. (6 Divinity Avenue, Cambridge, near the Science Center and the other Harvard museums). Tour will last approximately 90 minutes.
COST: $10 (to cover the cost of keeping the Museum open past normal hours) + $5 for non-members

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: TOUR the HOUSES of ANCIENT ISRAEL at HARVARD’S SEMITIC MUSEUM
